001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Ship;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Shot;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
007import java.util.List;
008import retrofit2.http.Body;
009import retrofit2.http.GET;
010import retrofit2.http.HTTP;
011import retrofit2.http.Header;
012import retrofit2.http.POST;
013import retrofit2.http.PUT;
014import retrofit2.http.Path;
015
016/**
017 * Invoked by the repository to make {@link HTTP} requests to the server.
018 */
019public interface JataServiceProxy {
020
021
022  @POST("games")
023  Single<Game> startGame(
024      @Body Game game,
025      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
026
027  @GET("games/{key}")
028  Single<Game> getGame(
029      @Path("key") String key,
030      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
031
032  @PUT("games/{gameKey}/ships")
033  Single<Game> submitShips(
034      @Path("gameKey") String key,
035      @Body List<Ship> ships,
036      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
037
038  @POST("games/{gameKey}/shots")
039  Single<Game> submitShots(
040      @Path("gameKey") String key,
041      @Body List<Shot> shots,
042      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
043
044}
